item.title: Kitoy Edition
item.description: Hey everyone. I'm thrilled to share some exciting news with you all! The documentation landscape is about to undergo a transformation with the introduction of `Kitoy Edition Beta` â€” a release that places a strong focus on how this website behaves in preparation for the Next Big Thing. {/truncate/}
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone. I'm thrilled to share some exciting news with you all! The documentation landscape is about to undergo a transformation with the introduction of Kitoy Edition Beta â€” a release that places a strong focus on how this website behaves in preparation for the Next Big Thing.

What's this?â€‹

In the ever-evolving tech landscape, being ahead of the curve is crucial. We are gearing up to set a new standard with a heightened emphasis on how the website behaves in anticipation of the Next Big Thing. This release is a testament to our commitment to staying at the forefront of innovation.

Algolia Searchâ€‹

Big thanks to Algolia! One of the standout features in this release is the integration of Algolia search. We know how crucial it is for users to quickly find the information they need, and Algolia's powerful search and discovery API makes that happen. It's a game-changer for enhancing the user experience, aligning seamlessly with our focus on preparing for the future. In this release, we utilize the default configuration with a little bit of tweak.

Custom Configurationâ€‹

Flexibility has always been a priority for us. We're introducing the concept of running optional with custom configuration. It's about giving you the control to make your workflow as efficient as possible, aligning perfectly with our goal of preparing for what comes next.

Thank you for your time.

-K

item.title: On GitHub Pages
item.description: As we joyfully usher in the auspicious Year of the Dragon, {/ truncate /}
item.content:encoded:
As we joyfully usher in the auspicious Year of the Dragon, we are thrilled to share a double celebration with our community. Not only are we embracing the festive spirit of Chinese New Year, but we're also excited to announce that our website is now public and proudly served through GitHub Pages. ðŸŽ‰ðŸ¥³ðŸ’¥

Additionally, we've given our online space a facelift with a brand-new banner, too.

item.title: Kamaoism
item.description: Kamaoism is the term used to describe a fictional collective of individuals who identify themselves as Kamoists. Although the exact origin of this group remains unverified, there are theories suggesting that it originated in the vicinity of Point Nemo. 48Â°52.6â€²S 123Â°23.6â€²W.
item.content:encoded:
Kamaoism is the term used to describe a fictional collective of individuals who identify themselves as Kamoists. Although the exact origin of this group remains unverified, there are theories suggesting that it originated in the vicinity of Point Nemo. 48Â°52.6â€²S 123Â°23.6â€²W.

The Ostrich Event

item.title: The Keyword
item.description: Hello and welcome to the Kitimi family! {/ truncate /} It is an honor to collaborate with such talented and dedicated individuals
item.content:encoded:
Hello and welcome to the Kitimi family! It is an honor to collaborate with such talented and dedicated individuals In the fast-changing world of technology, being adaptable and collaborating with others are crucial. Feel free to share your ideas, challenge the norm, and collaborate fearlessly. We will overcome challenges and seize opportunities together. As we commence this exciting journey, please know my door is open for your support, ideas, and personal/professional growth.

Happy coding!

item.title: Welcome
